# swapi_planet (Data Source)

Planet data source

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "swapi_planet" "dagobah" {
  name = "Dagobah"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Planet Name

### Read-Only

- `diameter` (Number) Planet diameter
- `id` (String) Planet Id
- `population` (Number) Planet population
